snippet: Viswanathan Anand has a special relationship with Germany’s Budesliga, a lucrative source of income for players trying to earn a living at chess.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column; former world champion Viswanathan Anand has a special relationship with Germany’s Budesliga, Europe's best professional chess league, which is lucrative source of income for players trying to earn living at chess.
lead_paragraph: Viswanathan Anand has a special relationship with Germany’s Budesliga, a lucrative source of income for players trying to earn a living at chess.

headline.print_headline: League Play Pays Off for a Former Champ, Too
headline.main: League Play Pays Off for a Former Champ, Too
